TopicTitle: The KSP Community My Little Pony Megathread

Articles.Content:
12, actually. >

I know. Though the guys may make fun of me on Skype, I need to enjoy my innocent, sweet tone before it\'s gone and the last shards of my childhood slip away.

sorry mate. guess it was monkthespy who was 10. ohh well. like when i first went on xbox 360 age 12 (now age 15) i was kicked from games/party\'s due to my voice. things will change both for better and for worse. but you can survive

Haha, well, my favorite is not even one of the mane-6, what surprises me though is that the last of the six that Caesar is similar to is Twilight Sparkle.

Wut, i doubt that, i am not very hard working, so there goess apple jack, i dont care a ton about what i look like or if everything is perfect, rarirty out, i havent been to a party in over 2 years, but i do enjoy my fun, so pinkie pie is still there, and i am not daring at all like rainbow dash, or fast, and not the most loyalist, so really`twilights the most similar to me, she studies and reads, like me, is really good at pony schooling, like me, reads about stuff like science and history for fun, like me, face palms a lot, like me, and more.
I\'m a mix of Twilight and Rainbow Dash.

Bumping this up to remind our resident equines to keep your horsey-bizness in here.

Thanks

Bumping this up to remind our resident equines to keep your horsey-bizness in here.

Thanks

I learned that the hard way, i though a pinkie pie welcome song would be cool to welcome a guy, apparently the mods thought otherwise.
If it\'s going to be bumped on a regular basis then why not just sticky it :V
Theres not much to right here considering season 3 wont be out for awhile.

<cruel pony image snipped>

I\'m not even going to reply to that.

It seems to me you are trying to start a flame war.

Kepp your hate out of this thread.

I\'m not even going to reply to that.

It seems to me you are trying to start a flame war.

Kepp your hate out of this thread.

Welp, you just broke the law \'\'Don\'t reply to the troll, it feeds him.\'\'

Nevertheless, ponies don\'t need gasoline to be lit on fire, i think they are actually flammable on their own.

The image has been removed. I will not tolerate pony hate in their thread. This thread is where they can be safe from idiots like that.

As Ascensiam said, don\'t feed the troll by replying, just report it and move on. We\'ll take it from there.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
So guys, gona start a real discusion up in here: what is your favourete episode, apart from s2 finale

So guys, gona start a real discusion up in here: what is your favourete episode, apart from s2 finale

Actually i really hate having to choose episodes, but golden moments were present, like Luna Eclipsed and when Derpy stole an episode by opening her mouth. The season finale was very good, adequately cheesy and perhaps a tad rushed but nothing unexpected.

No favorites though, whole season was a charm.

Favorites? Blasphemy! I love them all!

Although, the ones with the music I might like a leeeeetle more. Dunno \'bout that though.

Honestly, it\'s a hard choice. I\'ll just put a list of my favorites (besides the finale), and why:

Luna Eclipsed: Luna. Need I say more?

Hurricane Fluttershy: Training with 80\'s style music.

Return of Harmony pt 2: Why? Because Discord, that\'s why!

Read it and Weep: The perfect analogy for bronies.

Lesson Zero: Insane Twi is hilarious.

A Dog and Pony Show: Had to pause the show when Rarity was whining, it was too funny.

Winter Wrap Up: Musical. AWESOME

A Friend in Deed: \'nother musical. AWESOME

I used to dread the songs, but I came around.

well to toss my hat into the ring, winter wrap up has to be up their, and so does the one where the main gang told stories on how they got their cutie marks. just an opinion ohh and the cider one, that made me chuckle when we all knew aj was right
Derpy is Best Pon\'e
